offer_summary.job_title: Freelance Senior RoR Developer with JavaScript
offer_summary.job_description: You will be a Senior Ruby on Rails Developer with experience in JavaScript and email technologies like Mailgun or SparkPost. We are looking for candidates who can deliver high-quality code and contribute to our projects seamlessly.
requirements: Senior Ruby on Rails developer with experience in JavaScript and email technologies
Experience with AJAX, CSS, and HTML
Solid basics of JavaScript (experience with Ember.js would be beneficial)
Strong problem-solving skills, curiosity to dig deep, debug and solve issues
An attitude not just to ship small patches but finding the root cause and fixing them.
Knowledge of English (C1), spoken and written
Professionality: Continuous Integration and Code Review in Agile methodology
Diversity: projects from various industries like fintech, healthcare, insurance, or education
Growth: Work with a team of experts and continuous development of your hard and soft skills
Knowledge: knowledge sharing sessions, internal knowledge base
requierd_skills: Experience in projects from various industries
